title: U.S. to Advise Boosters for Most Americans 8 Months After Vaccination
content:
1. U.S. to Advise Boosters for Most Americans 8 Months After Vaccination  The New York Times
  2. Is it possible you'll need more than 1 COVID-19 booster shot a year?  Good Morning America
  3. Israel’s active COVID cases pass 50,000, just 2 months after they hovered at 200  The Times of Israel
  4. A grim warning from Israel: Vaccination blunts, but does not defeat Delta  Science Magazine
  5. Two weeks in, Israel marks millionth COVID booster shot  Haaretz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国、ほとんどの米国人にワクチン接種後8ヶ月での再接種を推奨
美国建议大多数美国人在接种疫苗8个月后再进行强化接种
